Reviews.Title: Still a great phone.  Functions great on IOS 5.1
Reviews.Author: L.Gildart
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to give a 2012 perspective on a device that probably many people wouldn't necessarily think about buying out of concern that it might be outdated.  I bought mine just recently, and, while it is clearly not as awesome as one of the later model iPhones, it is a really great phone that runs the most recent operating system quite snappily and runs all of the applications I use flawlessly.  And I didn't need to commit to an expensive contract or data plan.  I'm super happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: My mind has been changed!
Reviews.Author: kmd
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this phone I was concerned purchasing this iPhone 3gs 32GB online but I can tell you that I am absolutely pleased. My iPhone 3gs was destroyed but fortunately I backed up my information.  As long as I could find another iPhone, my information should be able to be saved to a "new" phone.  Price was an issue.  My Upgrade was not due for another  6 months and I could not afford to spend alot of money.  The price for this phone was reasonable and although this iPhone listed is sold as used, I can not tell that it's ever been used. This product came in pristine condition, in a sealed box and did not look as this ever touched human hands.  I "restored" this "New" phone from my destroyed but saved old iPhone data and I have now had my iPhone for a few months and have not had any problems what so ever.  Everything transferred over as it should and truly this product (iPhone)  has made this Amazon customer very happy.  I would purchase this product again through amazon.

Reviews.Title: best christmas ever
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: hello, i just recieved my iphone 3gs 32gb white model a couple days ago and i have enjoyed it. it came in the original box and they even included the wall charger as an extra which was nice. anyway it has minor scraches and has a little notch looking thing in the middle area. but all in all i cant complain too much lets just say i got i really good deal and im satisfied

Reviews.Title: For a first time iPhone user you will not be disappointed - great versatility & utility - absolutely amazing. ... read on...
Reviews.Author: AgogoLive
Reviews.Content: This little marvel will literally become your new best friend.  YOu will become absolutely besotted with it and amazed at the 100s of 1000s of clever little apps which you can mostly purchase for 99cents!Everything at your fingertips from your diary, to alarm to weather reports, public transport schedule, your photo albums, videos, music repertory (ipod embedded), CAMERA!, VIDEO CAMERA...bible...notebook, carpentry measuring tools, email, INTERNET BROWSER, YouTube anywhere, GAMES games games... ANYTHING YOU CAN THINK OF REALLY... even a scanner that turns your "scans" into pdf format for emailing etc.It loses 1.5 star only because of being an "older" model but the price makes up for this.Fully charged the battery powers on for days (if you know what to turn off to energy efficient mode) and QUICK CHARGES.  I am constantly amazed at how quickly it charges to 100% virtually within the hour.I have the white - which is STILL THE BEST LOOKING. (biased yes)If you are willing to fork out more, obviously the new model has improvements. One marked improvement is DEFINITELY THE CAMERA RESOLUTION OF THE 4G. Churns out markely superior photos and videos of course.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: Bought the iphone 3gs for my mother who was in need of a new phone.  She isnt too good with technology so i thought the iphone was the most user friendly and easy to teach.  The 3gs runs great with the most recent iOS system. I bought it used, so it had minor cosmetic problems but the actual phone worked fine.  For someone who isnt into advanced smart phones/iphones or tech savvy but wants something thats comparable i would definitely recommend this iphone.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Joseph G. Beckwith "JGB"
Reviews.Content: iPhone 3GS was advertised as used but in new condition.  That proved to be accurate and the phone actually appeared to be unused.  Regardless, it works fine and suitably replaces a broken 3G.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Wanda Waterman
Reviews.Content: This is a great iPhone, and could do all I wanted it to. It works perfectly and arrived in before the deadline. The price was great, too. I would definitely buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: short battery life
Reviews.Author: percival q. santiago
Reviews.Content: the life of the battery is too short and now im having a hard time with this phone 'cause i updated the ios and now the phone is locked again :(

Reviews.Title: Good sale - Crap phone.
Reviews.Author: Mike Rice
Reviews.Content: The guy that sold me this phone was extremely helpful but the phone is a real shame. Awkwardly small and difficult to use, It took me a while to realize that this phone was meant for teenagers with good eyes and servitude to very popular phones no matter how poorly designed.Apple - BLECH!

Reviews.Title: New - but no warranty
Reviews.Author: J. Graves
Reviews.Content: I paid a premium price for a unit that was identified as new.  It was new, but Apple doesn't warranty a product after it is two years old.  You would have had to purchase a Square Trade warranty.  I returned it.  There are a lot better phones out there for less money

Reviews.Title: Apple Iphone 3GS!
Reviews.Author: Inti Paulino
Reviews.Content: I placed the order with Good Guys electronic because after contacting them about the phone they were quick and readyto answer all my questions. They described the phone as new and unlocked. When i received the phone it was brand new in its box and IMEI's were clean on both. It was surely also unlocked, which is a benefit for me since i don international traveling. I was very satisfied with the product description and support. The only issue i had was with shipping but with snow storms slowing UPS down it was not the sellers issue. Otherwise i would definitely buy from these Good Guys again.

Reviews.Title: It does not work....
Reviews.Author: Jerry Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointing in it, I was excited when this phone arrive however, I put my SIM card and it keep pop up no signal I have to sent it back right away...

Reviews.Title: LOCKED PHONE
Reviews.Author: FLO ADENI-AWOSIKA
Reviews.Content: IT WAS LOCKED, CANNOT USE IT FOR OTHER CARRIER EXCEPT FOR AT&T;, CANNOT SEND TEXTMESSAGES TO AFRICA & UNITED KINGDOM

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3gs
Reviews.Author: R. Stacks "Angela"
Reviews.Content: I got the phone and I love it. I do appreciate u sending my phone to me so quickly. U guys responded to my message quickly when I asked to get the phone overnighted to me u made sure it happened thank u I highly recommend u guys to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, well worth the price :)
Reviews.Author: kelsi
Reviews.Content: This phone is absoultly amazing, it's brand new no scratches or nothing and the seller of this product was so helpful with I asked if the phone came with an owners manual they told me it didn't and then turned around and sent me an email of the owners manual, so nice!

Reviews.Title: Opinion about Apple iPhone 3GS 32GB (White)
Reviews.Author: by Mariana C Barbosa       Opnion of Purchase...
Reviews.Content: Opinion about Apple iPhone 3GS 32GB (White) : it is ok, no big deal as it is a transparant case.

Reviews.Title: Meets all my limited requirements
Reviews.Author: Brian Stewart
Reviews.Content: Simple requirements included ... open, standard SIM card, 32Gb, camera, apple product, similar to a g3 touch, std plug in, new condition.The unit supplied met all requirements including surprise surprise a rapid response  to I question I had asked from the supplier.Colour me happy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality cell phones
Reviews.Author: puky 2011 ceq
Reviews.Content: very good cell phone, it has the ultimate software, exelent pakaged, delivered on time,  the phone seemed like new, and comes with all necessary accessories,Iphone 3GS 32GB White

Reviews.Title: It will do...
Reviews.Author: D. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: Nice enough phone but it is missing the volume controls on the side of the phone. It's suitable for now.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Ginamarie
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this phone well the white one and he received the black one we were told it would be better but the phone was scratched and it would make this loud noise and hang up and turn of on you...my husband loves all apple products but if he is to buy a phone he would purchase a new iPhone not used after this

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: mirella
Reviews.Content: The phone it was broke and few days after stop to work ....I didn't send back because I don't know how

Reviews.Title: Received a 3GS 16GB, Ordered 3GS 32GB
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed that the phone I received wasn't the one I ordered, because I thought that I'd scored big! Need less to say, when I opened the package and saw 16GB casing, I can't say that I was surprised. However, the price paid would be amazing for 32GB and good for 16GB. I still see prices much higher than this for 16GB.No problems with the phone thus far. Everything works well -I am satisfied with this purchase (excluding the mix up with the GBs).

Reviews.Title: Drop dead battery
Reviews.Author: Nick-Nok
Reviews.Content: Defective battery, fully charged for not more than 15 mins use. Maybe that's the reason why the price is $213. I ended up selling the phone at the same price to my friend.  Not very happy, sorry but that is my experience.

Reviews.Title: i didn't purchase it finally
Reviews.Author: Jiangyan Zhu
Reviews.Content: It's a good product, and we want a to-go phone without data plan. However, it is still attached to ATT, may have data plan required, so we didn't buy it finally.
